column5: Hi. Heading up tp Killbear prov park next week and hauling a small alum boat. I understand there are ramps in the park just interested in any general area for panfish and walleye, I will be fishing with a couple of kids so want to keep them interested for a least a couple hours.    Thanks

Blind Bay, I used to throw the lines out with bobbers off of the rocks for the kids and they would hook into bass. Nab yourself some cray fish from the shoreline. I used a sand sifter from the sand box as a catch basin for them and it worked like a charm.
